item.description:
Please join us for a reception with Roger Goun, the featured artist for April and May at the Seacoast Artist Association gallery in Exeter. Roger is well known on the New Hampshire Seacoast as a landscape, event, and street photographer. He will be exhibiting a wide selection of his work from the past five years, including photographs from the American West, Japan, New Hampshire's White Mountains and Seacoast, and the coast of Maine.

If you can't make it to the reception, the exhibit at the Seacoast Artist Association gallery runs from April 1st to May 31st.

Snarky version: please come and eat some of the yummy snacks my wife is preparing for this reception. You can also look at my photos if you'd like.
item.name: Featured Artist Reception - Roger Goun
